self.philbrown.cssparser

Class Scanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • self.philbrown.cssparser.Scanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParserConstants

    public class Scanner
extends Object
implements ParserConstants
    Scans the input stream for CSS syntax. Each Object that is a CSS component is recognized as a Token and is handled by the parser.
    Since:
    2:39:59 PM Dec 18, 2013
    Author:
    Phil Brown
